verbose_text: In the study reported here, we improved the drought tolerance of highly recalcitrant indica rice cultivar Samba Mahsuri (BPT 5204), which has medium slender grains with excellent cooking quality, by introducing the Arabidopsis CBF3 / DREB1A gene driven by the stress inducible rd29A promoter.
evidence: DREB1A gene driven by the stress-inducible rd29A promoter
